description: The best Thanksgiving drinks are the ones that you can sip on all day long. If you're looking for a cocktail to enjoy while your turkey is cooking, then this Whiskey Cranberry Slush recipe will be just right! It's&nbsp;refreshing and delicious with just enough kick to keep you feeling festive.
name: Whiskey Cranberry Slush

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all of the ingredients in a large pitcher and stir until sugar dissolves. Pour into freezer trays or ice cube molds, cover with plastic wrap, and freeze until icy.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all of the ingredients in a large pitcher and stir until sugar dissolves. Pour into freezer trays or ice cube molds, cover with plastic wrap, and freeze until icy.

recipeInstructions.name: Scrape the frozen mixture with a spoon and divide among glasses, filling them three-quarters of the way.
recipeInstructions.text: Scrape the frozen mixture with a spoon and divide among glasses, filling them three-quarters of the way.

recipeInstructions.name: Divide the remaining 3 cups of cranberry juice among the glasses and top with the diced cranberries. Stir until slushy and garnish with mint.
